vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_1.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Token.withdrawToken (patch_1.sol#27-33):
	-require(bool)(token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),to,amount)) patch_1.sol#32

	-require(bool)(_addr.call.value(_wei)()) patch_1.sol#72
